Subject: Upgradation of PingCastle on Dev Server
Description:
Hi Team,

Good day!!

We are planning to upgrade the PingCastle version on the development server first and then on production server.

Can you please share the documentation or steps to do the above activity?

We can have a short call for the discussion to see the current configuration and then proceed further.


Thanks,
Akhil
Solution_Comment__c: Conducted a meeting with client to gave him an overview of PingCastle upgrade process and shared the relevant KB article.
